JenkinsSvcInstall.Name: Ensure
JenkinsSvcInstall.Description: Says whether the service is installed on the machine.

JenkinsSvcInstall.Name: InstallKey
JenkinsSvcInstall.Description: Unique identifier for your DSC installation

JenkinsSvcInstall.Name: Port
JenkinsSvcInstall.Description: Port the Jenkins Instance should listen on.

JenkinsSvcInstall.Name: RunSetupWizard
JenkinsSvcInstall.Description: Enable or Disable the Unlock screen in Jenkins v2 and above.

JenkinsSvcInstall.Name: AdminCredential
JenkinsSvcInstall.Description: Specifies a user and password account to be set as Administrator of the Jenkins Instance, using the default security mode.

JenkinsSvcInstall.Name: RunServiceAs
JenkinsSvcInstall.Description: Specifies an account to run the service as. If not set, Jenkins will run as NETWORK SERVICE

JenkinsSvcJavaOption.Name: ResolutionMode
JenkinsSvcJavaOption.Description: Says how the list of options should be merged with the existing one.

JenkinsSvcJavaOption.Name: Tokens
JenkinsSvcJavaOption.Description: List of Tokens to be Merged with the existing one, based on the ResolutionBehavior

JenkinsSvcJavaOption.Name: ServiceName
JenkinsSvcJavaOption.Description: Identifying the Service Name to find the JENKINS_HOME based on teh Service executable.
